references: J. Riordan, An Introduction to Combinatorial Analysis, Wiley, 1958, p. 198.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
mathematica: max = 23; f[x_, y_] := Sum[n!*((x*y)^n/(1 + x*(y-1))^(2*n+1)), {n, 0, max} ]; t = MapIndexed[Take[#1, #2[[1]]]&, CoefficientList[Series[f[x, y], {x, 0, max}, {y, 0, max}], {x, y}]]; a[n_] := t[[n+1, n-3]]; Table[a[n], {n, 4, max}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 08 2016, after _Vladeta Jovovic_ in A058057 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Simon Plouffe_
